plugins.name: Sizr
plugins.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
plugins.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

111068.name: Sizr
111068.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
111068.release_notes:
Support for Components
Added:
- The plugin now supports resizing elements based on the grid of a parent `COMPONENT` in addition to a `FRAME`.
- Automatically detects whether the parent is a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a valid grid layout.
- Displays appropriate notifications if resizing is restricted (e.g., when dealing with a master component).

Fixed:
- Improved error handling and user feedback for unsupported parent types or missing grid layouts.

How to Use:
1. Select an element within a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a grid.
2. Trigger the plugin to resize compatible elements based on the grid layout.
111068.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

plugins.name: Section Generator
plugins.description:
Allows you to create a large number of sections all at once. This is a great way to organize a handoff file with each row for different functionality or features.


Main section

Each main section is a row with a cover tile. The cover tile will be titled with the name you give. Main sections are stacked vertically.


Subsections

Configure the number of subsections you want per row. Subsections are spaced horizontally.


-> Allows you to include any number of desktop (1440) and mobile (390) screens

-> Each screen has a notes field below it for your annotations
plugins.tagline: Create sections of sections for an organized design handoff

plugins.name: Lint copy
plugins.description:
Lint copy helps UX writers and content designers automatically enforce style rules with a custom word list.


Enforce things like plain language (e.g. detect "utilize" and suggest replacing it with "use"), the company's voice and tone (e.g. detect "we are" and suggest using the contraction), and even product terminology.


Create a custom word list in JSON and host it in a public GitHub repository to experience the plugin's full power.


The plugin also enforces sentence case and strings starting with a capital, neither of which is customizable.


For full details, read the documentation.
plugins.tagline: Check text layers against a word list to enforce style, voice, and terminology.

plugins.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
plugins.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.


Features :


- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Work with current selection, page, or entire file

- See what will change before you apply it

- Handle thousands of variables at once

- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variables


How to use :


1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.

2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.

3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.


Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.


RoadMap :


- Find all variables used in your designs

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.
plugins.tagline: Master all your variable workflows

plugins.name: BlendAI
plugins.description:
BlendAI seamlessly integrates with Figma to let you generate high-quality images from text prompts or combine up to three reference images in a single click. It’s perfect for product mockups, hero banners, packshots, concept art, backgrounds, or quick visual inspiration—without ever leaving your Figma file.


Key Features:

• Simple prompt → image

Type a natural-language description and instantly receive a crisp, AI-rendered result.

• Multi-reference blending

Upload up to three reference images (for example: a product shot, a texture, and a background) and instruct BlendAI to place, style, or combine them.

Example: “Place @IMG_1 in front of @IMG_2 with the lighting mood of @IMG_3.”

• Six aspect-ratio presets

1:1 (Square), 16:9 (Landscape), 9:16 (Portrait), 4:3 (Classic), 3:4 (Portrait), 21:9 (Ultrawide)

• Instant one-click generation

No manual exports or workarounds—everything happens directly in Figma’s interface.

• Credit-based system

Includes a free 10-image starter pack. Easily top up credits from the “Get More” menu.

• History & quick re-use

View, revisit, and re-generate past images directly within the plugin.


BlendAI was built for designers who need on-the-fly visuals—whether it’s a quick hero image for a mockup, a polished packshot for a product page, or a fully blended scene combining multiple photo references. Try it free, then unlock larger credit packs for heavy usage.
plugins.tagline: AI image generation & multi-reference blending inside Figma for hero banners, mockups or backgrounds

plugins.name: Scout : Your Design System Auditor
plugins.description:
Scout: Your Design System Auditor

Ever felt like your design tokens are playing hide-and-seek? 🕵️‍♀️ Meet Scout, your trusty design detective—ready to sniff out sneaky inconsistencies and bring harmony back to your Figma universe!


Scout swiftly audits your Figma files, uncovering rogue color hexes and typography rebels that forgot their tokens at home. No more developer handoff blues or "Oops, missed that!" moments. 🎯


Superpowers:

Color Detective: Catches color chaos quicker than you can shout “Hex!”


Typography Sleuth: Spots font fugitives and sizes that went astray, keeping your design tight.


Smart Suggestions: Suggests spot-on tokens and handy fallbacks instantly—because who doesn't love instant magic? ✨


Theme-Agnostic: Works seamlessly with both light and dark themes, maintaining style consistency across all modes.


Local Variable & Style Support: Perfectly compatible with local variables and styles, ensuring complete design system integration.


Pinpoint Precision: Clearly tells you exactly where the issue is—no guessing games, just solutions!


How to Use Scout:


1. Feed Your Tokens: Connect Scout to your design system first—it'll securely save all your tokens locally.

2. Scan: Open Scout in any Figma file, select the frame you want to check, and hit "Scan."

3. Instant Results: Scout immediately highlights issues, suggests precise fixes, and ensures your designs stay token-perfect.


Scout is fun, quirky, and deadly accurate; a designer's best friend and a developer's dream come true. Let Scout do the heavy lifting and keep your designs perfectly polished. 


Get Scout today and give your design system the auditor it deserves.


Scout is currently in beta. Found bugs? Have questions, suggestions, or feature requests? 💌 DM me on Twitter

accepted.name: Satyam
accepted.description: Product and UI/UX Designer | Email me at sat02yam@gmail.com

plugins.tagline: Keep Scouting

plugins.name: FlipArabic
plugins.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

plugins.name: Auto Layout Remover
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Remover helps you quickly clean up messy Figma files and make them easier to edit or prototype.


When to use it:

  1. You want to redesign freely. If your design is full of auto layouts and deeply nested frames, and you just want to move things around without dealing with layout constraints — this plugin flattens everything so you can edit with ease.
  2. You’re building an interactive prototype. Auto layouts often create layers and nesting that block or overlap each other. This plugin helps you clean the structure fast — so you can bring the right blocks to the top and avoid layout issues.


What it does:

  1. Turns off all auto layouts, keeping objects in place
  2. Ungroups frames and groups without visible styles (no fill, no stroke, or hidden)
  3. Deletes hidden layers and empty frames
  4. Leaves instances and styled frames untouched
  5. Makes your file flat, clean, and easy to work with
plugins.tagline: Remove all auto layouts, empty frames, and groups in one click.

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
## 🎯 核心功能

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，分别应用最适合的行高倍数

- **统一行高模式**：为所有选中文本应用相同的行高倍数，精确控制排版节奏

- **批量处理**：支持选中 Frame、Group 等容器，一键处理内部所有文本图层


## ✨ 使用场景

- 快速统一设计稿中的文字行高

- 优化阅读体验，单行标题紧凑，段落文本舒适

- 批量调整多个页面的文字排版


## 🔧 默认设置

- **单行文本**：1.0 倍（紧凑排版）

- **段落文本**：1.68 倍（黄金比例，舒适阅读）

- **支持自定义调整**：0.1–5 倍


## 🆕 更新日志 v2.0

- 新增智能识别功能，自动区分单行和段落文本

- 新增统一行高模式，满足不同设计需求

- 优化 UI 界面，操作更直观

- 支持自定义行高倍数（0.1–5 倍）

- 行高计算采用向下取整，确保像素完美对齐


---


## 🎯 Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

- **Batch Processing**: Supports selection of Frames, Groups, and other containers to apply changes to all nested text layers in one click.


## ✨ Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages


## 🔧 Default Settings

- **Single-line text**: 1.0× (compact layout)

- **Paragraph text**: 1.68× (golden ratio for comfortable reading)

- **Supports custom adjustment** from 0.1× to 5.0×


## 🆕 Update Log - v2.0

- Added smart detection for single-line vs. paragraph text

- Introduced uniform line height mode for consistent styling

- Improved UI for a more intuitive experience

- Custom line height range support (0.1×–5.0×)

- Line height calculation now uses floor rounding for pixel-perfect alignment
plugins.tagline: 批量字号行高对齐

- **批量处理**：支持选中 Frame、Group 等容器，一键处理内部所有文本图层


## ✨ 使用场景

- 快速统一设计稿中的文字行高

- 优化阅读体验，单行标题紧凑，段落文本舒适

- 批量调整多个页面的文字排版


## 🔧 默认设置

- **单行文本**：1.0 倍（紧凑排版）

- **段落文本**：1.68 倍（黄金比例，舒适阅读）

- **支持自定义调整**：0.1–5 倍


## 🆕 更新日志 v2.0

- 新增智能识别功能，自动区分单行和段落文本

- 新增统一行高模式，满足不同设计需求

- 优化 UI 界面，操作更直观

- 支持自定义行高倍数（0.1–5 倍）

- 行高计算采用向下取整，确保像素完美对齐


---


## 🎯 Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

- **Batch Processing**: Supports selection of Frames, Groups, and other containers to apply changes to all nested text layers in one click.


## ✨ Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages


## 🔧 Default Settings

- **Single-line text**: 1.0× (compact layout)

- **Paragraph text**: 1.68× (golden ratio for comfortable reading)

- **Supports custom adjustment** from 0.1× to 5.0×


## 🆕 Update Log - v2.0

- Added smart detection for single-line vs. paragraph text

- Introduced uniform line height mode for consistent styling

- Improved UI for a more intuitive experience

- Custom line height range support (0.1×–5.0×)

- Line height calculation now uses floor rounding for pixel-perfect alignment

plugins.name: Frame Navigator
plugins.description:
🧭 FrameNavigator


Effortlessly navigate large and complex Figma files with FrameNavigator — a floating Table of Contents plugin that helps you stay organized and move between frames in a single click.


✨ Key Features


- Quick Navigation

Instantly jump to any frame from a floating panel that stays visible while you work.


- Custom Frame Registration

Select frames directly on the canvas and add them to your TOC with a simple "+" button.


- Group Organization

Organize your frames into custom groups for better structure and clarity—perfect for managing multiple screens.


- Flexible Panel Sizes

Choose between default, compact, and full views to match your workflow and screen space.


---


🛠 How It Works


  1. Register a Frame: Select a frame on the Figma canvas and click the `+` button in the plugin to add it to the TOC.
  2. Create a Group: Hover over ungrouped frames in the TOC and click the appearing checkbox to select them. Then click the Create Group button at the top of the panel to group them.
  3. Add to Existing Group: Select a group first, then select a new frame on the canvas and click `+` to add the frame into that group.
  4. Rename a Group: Double-click on a group name to edit it.
  5. Remove a Group: Right-click on a group and select **Remove Group**. ⚠️ Note: All frames inside that group will also be removed from the TOC.
  6. Reorder Frames: Drag and drop frames (or groups) within the TOC to change their order.


---


Perfect for design system creators, large prototyping flows, or anyone managing multi-screen layouts in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly jump between frames with a floating table of contents. Easily build your own TOC.

plugins.name: Forma
plugins.description:
🎨 FORMA: Design Systems in Minutes, Not Months! 🚀


Ever tried creating a design system from scratch? It's like trying to fold a fitted sheet – seemingly impossible and will probably make you cry. 😭


Forma swoops in to save your sanity with magical design system generation powers:


✨ COLOR SORCERY

• Create gorgeous Pantone-style color palettes

• Generate perfect shades that actually make sense

• Turn chaotic color choices into harmonious design languages


📝 TYPOGRAPHY WIZARDRY

• Conjure complete typography hierarchies faster than you can say "Comic Sans is unacceptable"

• 9 perfectly balanced text styles that your design lead will actually approve

• Font fallbacks that won't make your developers rage-quit


🧩 DESIGN TOKENS

• Spacing systems that maintain mathematical harmony

• Size tokens that scale beautifully across devices

• Consistent radius values (because inconsistent corner radii are criminal)


⚠️ BETA ALERT ⚠️

This release is a preview of Forma's powers - not for production just yet! We're still brewing up more magical features like component generation, brand voice integration, and design consistency checks.


Created with ❤️ (and a lot of coffee) by a designer who got tired of rebuilding the same foundations over and over again.

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

plugins.name: Figma to Scabld
plugins.description:
Effortlessly Import Your Figma Designs into Scabld!


Transform your designs into mobile apps in no time with the Scabld plugin for Figma. Seamlessly bring your Figma screens into Scabld and move from design to a fully functional mobile app without any coding required. Our plugin automatically adapts your design to Scabld's no-code platform, so you can focus on turning your vision into reality.


How to use this plugin


1. Install the free Figma plugin.

2. Select your Figma designs.

3. Import them directly into Scabld.

4. Continue editing and customizing just like in Figma.

5. Add interactions and animations.

6. Finalize and publish your mobile app with zero code.


With Scabld, skip the hassle of manual conversions. Simply import your Figma files into our no-code platform and turn them into fully functional mobile apps. We preserve your layer names and design structure, making it easy to pick up where you left off and enhance your creations for a smooth user experience.


Preserve your layer structure.

When you import your designs, all your Figma groups and layer names are kept intact. This allows you to refine, adjust, and polish your app directly in Scabld without losing any important details.


Performance and optimization guaranteed.

When you publish with Scabld, we ensure your mobile app is optimized for peak performance across all devices. Every file is tuned for a fast and smooth experience, providing a high-quality result without compromising speed.


To learn more about Scabld and explore our other features, visit scabld.com.
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma designs into Scabld effortlessly.

plugins.name: Text Harvest
plugins.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
plugins.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

plugins.name: Figma Recall
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you save, manage, and switch between different versions (iterations) of your Figma frames.


Save an Iteration: Select a frame and click the Save button to save its current state.


Save with a Note: Hold Ctrl/Cmd and click the Save button to add a text description to your saved iteration.


Recall All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Recall button to view all its saved versions side-by-side.


Update Iterations: Make changes in the recalled container frame for any version and click Save to update with your changes in the stored master versions.


Navigate Versions: Use the < and > arrow buttons to cycle through saved iterations directly on your canvas.


Delete All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Delete button (trash icon) to remove all its saved versions.


Rename Iterations: Right-click the Save button to rename the selected frame and its entire group of saved iterations.
plugins.tagline: Version History but for Each Frame

plugins.name: Design-to-JSON
plugins.description:
Design to JSON: A Developer's Bridge


Supercharge your design-to-development workflow with Design to JSON. This plugin inspects your selected Figma layers and recursively exports the entire hierarchy into a clean, structured, and developer-friendly JSON format. Stop manually transcribing design specs and start automating your UI development.


Who Is It For?

This plugin is built primarily for Frontend Developers and UI Engineers who need to translate Figma designs into pixel-perfect code. It's also a powerful tool for Design System Maintainers and anyone looking to automate asset extraction or design analysis.


Key Features:

•Recursive Tree Traversal: It doesn't just scan the top layer. The plugin dives deep into all nested frames, groups, and components to give you a complete hierarchical view.

•Absolute Coordinates for Layout: Outputs the global coordinates and dimensions (absoluteRenderBounds) for every element, which is exactly what you need for CSS positioning, eliminating guesswork with relative positions.

•Comprehensive Property Extraction: Captures a wide range of properties crucial for development:

oGeometry: Position, size, rotation.

oStyling: Fills, strokes, and effects with RGBA color values (0-255).

oTypography: Font family, style, size, line height, letter spacing, and alignment.

oAuto Layout: Direction, padding, and item spacing.

oComponent Info: Details about instances and their main components.

•Simple & Clean UI: A straightforward interface to generate and copy the JSON with a single click.


How to Use:

1.Select one or more elements on your Figma canvas.

2.Run the "Design to JSON" plugin.

3.Click the "Generate JSON" button.

4.The JSON output will appear in the text area.

5.Click "Copy to Clipboard" to grab the data and use it in your code.


Best Practices for Your Design File:

To get the most accurate and useful JSON, it's recommended to follow these design practices:

•Name Your Layers: Use descriptive layer names (e.g., "SubmitButton" instead of "Rectangle 128"). These names appear directly in the JSON, making it much more readable.

•Embrace Auto Layout: The plugin is built to understand Auto Layout. Using it for components, buttons, and layouts will provide rich data (padding, spacing, direction) that is directly translatable to Flexbox or similar CSS models.

•Use Components: Structuring your design with components helps maintain a clean hierarchy, which will be reflected in the JSON output. The plugin captures instance information.

•Avoid Unnecessary Grouping: Whenever possible, use Frames with Auto Layout instead of nested groups (Group > Group > Element). This results in a cleaner and more semantic JSON structure.


Limitations & Caveats:

•Mixed Styles in Text: While the plugin recursively finds the properties of individual elements, if a single text node contains multiple styles (e.g., different fonts or colors applied to different words), the Figma API provides summary data. The plugin will note this but cannot separate the mixed styles within that single element.

•Complex Vector Data: This plugin focuses on properties relevant for UI layout and styling. It does not export the raw path data (<path d="...">) of complex vector networks or boolean operations.

•API Boundaries: The plugin can only extract data that is exposed by the official Figma Plugin API.


Support the Developer

This plugin is developed and maintained with love. If you find it useful and it saves you time, you can say thanks by supporting its future development. Every bit of support is hugely appreciated!

plugins.name: Variables Management
plugins.description:
This plugin remaps variables between libraries inside the Figma variable table.


It’s useful when working with two connected libraries. If both libraries are duplicated for a new project, then the libraries remain connected to the original libraries.


This plugin can automatically remap those variable connections with a new library.


Currently it's maping the variables inside Figma's variable table only.
